actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT category AS category,
       sum(views) AS views_trend_cat
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
WHERE date >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	AND channel_display_name like {{Channel_select.selectedOptionValue ? Channel_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}} 
	AND category like {{Category_select.selectedOptionValue ? Category_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}} and category is not null
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY views_trend_cat DESC
LIMIT 1;
